title: would grasp be op if spells proced it?
body: Like dark harvest. It would open it up to more champs who can't auto well in lane. Think it would be too much?

replies.body: Do you want pokers to have tons of sustain? Cause that's how you get pokers with tons of sustain.

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LJO3NiqU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-20T16:14:24.585+0000)
>
> Do you want pokers to have tons of sustain? Cause that's how you get pokers with tons of sustain.

not really because most are ranged and it would be reduced to 40%. Plus there is already fleet? So unless they are building tank it would be bad.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LJO3NiqU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-11-20T16:15:52.620+0000)
>
> not really because most are ranged and it would be reduced to 40%. Plus there is already fleet? So unless they are building tank it would be bad.

first off it is reduced BY 40% not to 40% so it is 60%. Fleet requires you to get in auto range and does not grant you permanent HP and the empowered auto does not deal extra damage. A spell grasp would proc on Ziggs Q xerath Q velkoz all spells. you get my point I think. It wouldn't benefit melee tanks in the slightest since they are already melee and autoing. So who is it helping?

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LJO3NiqU,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-20T16:26:40.005+0000)
>
> first off it is reduced BY 40% not to 40% so it is 60%. Fleet requires you to get in auto range and does not grant you permanent HP and the empowered auto does not deal extra damage. A spell grasp would proc on Ziggs Q xerath Q velkoz all spells. you get my point I think. It wouldn't benefit melee tanks in the slightest since they are already melee and autoing. So who is it helping?

melee champs like {{champion:82}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:68}} who cant really auto well but can poke

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LJO3NiqU,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-20T16:30:45.928+0000)
>
> melee champs like {{champion:82}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:68}} who cant really auto well but can poke

I don't think Aatrox needs any buffs tbh.
Morde is in dire need of a rework and I believe all his mains would be pissed to see any patchfixing
And a sustain rumble is something that (like the grasp gp we all so patiently endured) will just be pickban in pro.
I am not trying to be offensive or anything, It is just my pov. Sorry if I come across as an ass
The ones with targetted spell with a big range would be overbearing tbh, like {{champion:1}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:13}}

> [{quoted}](name=Shrek will rek,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LJO3NiqU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-20T16:50:23.343+0000)
>
> The ones with targetted spell with a big range would be overbearing tbh, like {{champion:1}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:13}}

i mean, they can already proc it easy between their spells and teemo already uses grasp in some builds
Wouldn't make too much of a difference, but it might be overbearing on certain champions. Even then there is already Taste of Blood(?) which periodically heals you when you damage an enemy champion.
